title: Silver to bronze
body: I am s5 0 lp and my mmr is for b1.i have lose 7-8 games in 0 points.if i lose one more i will get demoted?

replies.body: If you weren't recently promoted and gained a [shield](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204010760-Ranked-Play-FAQ#h6q3), then it's very possible to get demoted if you are consistently losing at 0 LP.  There is that risk until you are able to climb back up there.  Good luck!
